ml_tags: Whosoever believeth in Him should not perish, but have Eternal Life Sadly missed along life's way, quietly remembered every day. 2nd February 1940 - 8th July 2018 Treasured Memories of our NUTT Dearly Loved Mother Joan No longer in our life to share, but in our hearts, you're always there. Beloved Husband Andrew David (Derek) M.B.E. 18th December 1932 - 10th December 2019 And Cherished Son David Alexander 2nd February 1964 - 13th April 2021
